name: Seam
headline: API for IoT Devices
description: Seam lets developers connect and control 3rd-party connected devices like door locks, thermostats, and more.

founders.name: Dawn Ho, Founder
founders.description: Everything Engineer. Formerly head of IoT at Sonder. Always hacking on something interesting, and generally passionate about the intersection of automation, design, and living spaces. Also have a law degree.

founders.name: Sy Bohy, Founder
founders.description: Stitching the interface to the physical world.

Link Any Account Seam's pre-built login flows guide your users to find and connect their devices with your application. ##### Prompt User Unlock doors across brands using a single API and SDKs ##### Select Manufacturer Set temporary and permanent access codes for your users ##### Enter Login Credentials Users use OAuth or their login credentials ##### Select Devices Users can then select which devices they want to connect to your app ##### [Read about Connect WebViews](https://seam.co/) * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27300%27%20height=%27538.3333333333334%27/%3e)![Select Devices](https://seam.co) * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27300%27%20height=%27538.3333333333334%27/%3e)![Initial disclosure screen](https://seam.co) * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27300%27%20height=%27538.3333333333334%27/%3e)![Select Manufacturer](https://seam.co) * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27300%27%20height=%27538.3333333333334%27/%3e)![Authorize App](https://seam.co) * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27300%27%20height=%27538.3333333333334%27/%3e)![Select Devices](https://seam.co) * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27300%27%20height=%27538.3333333333334%27/%3e)![Initial disclosure screen](https://seam.co) Device Categories # Connect Any Device From smartlocks and thermostats, to whole building access and energy systems, Seam supports multiple device & system categories. ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2780%27%20height=%2780%27/%3e)![Image of a black smart lock](https://seam.co) ### Smart Locks Control brands like August, Igloohome, Yale, Kwikset, and more, using a single API to lock, unlock, and create access codes. [Smartlocks API](https://seam.co/) ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2780%27%20height=%2780%27/%3e)![Image of a black intercom](https://seam.co) ### Intercoms & Access Systems Unlock lobby doors, issue credentials, edit resident directories, and more, across brands like Latch, 2N, Akuvox, and more. [Access Control Docs](https://seam.co/) ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2780%27%20height=%2780%27/%3e)![Image of a black sensor](https://seam.co) ### Sensors Get temperature, humidity, or noise level, and receive webhook events on threshold crossing. [Sensor Docs](https://seam.co/) ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2780%27%20height=%2780%27/%3e)![Image of a black thermostat](https://seam.co) ### Thermostats Beta Turn up the heat or keep it chill. Set schedules, adjust preferences, and much more, all using a single API. [Request Access](https://seam.co/) ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2780%27%20height=%2780%27/%3e)![Image of a black camera](https://seam.co) ### Cameras Soon Tap into live feeds, receive events, and more. Contact us for early beta access. [Request Access](https://seam.co/) Unified Solution # Integrated Suite of Tools Seam provides APIs, client libraries, extensive documentation, and advanced dashboards to unify your device fleet operations. Build any workflow imaginable, set granular permissions across thousand person organizations, and much more. ### API & Client libraries ``` $ npm i seamapi ``` ``` $ pip install seamapi ``` ``` $ bundle add seamapi ``` ``` $ composer require seamapi/seam ``` ``` implementation 'io.github.seamapi:seam:0.x.x' ``` ``` $ cargo add seamapi-rs ``` ``` $ curl https://connect.getseam.com ``` Seam provides a set of APIs and client libraries that standardize common functions across device brands. This lets software developers implement any workflow imaginable. ### Operation Dashboards ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%271380%27%20height=%27884%27/%3e)![Seam Dashboard laptop](https://seam.co) The Seam Dashboard provides a unified interface that lets your Operation and Support teams work together to manage device fleets for a large number of locations. Seam provides a set of APIs and client libraries that standardize common functions across device brands. This lets software developers implement any workflow imaginable. The Seam Dashboard provides a unified interface that lets your Operation and Support teams work together to manage device fleets for a large number of locations. Components # Pre-built UI Components Seam provides a library of pre-built UI components to ship device UIs in minutes, not days. It handles securely retrieving device data and letting your application users issue device commands. With hundreds of device brands out there, it is not possible for you to own every device. This makes validating your code tricky. To solve this, Seam provides sandbox devices that accurately reproduce real device behavior. Use them to test your code, run CI, execute scenarios, and more. ##### [Learn about Sandbox Workspaces](https://seam.co/) ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27517%27%20height=%27418%27/%3e)![Seam Sandbox Illustration](https://seam.co) Seam Bridge # Need to Connect Offline Devices?
